data.name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Magcargo. If you do , this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded.

data.flavorText: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

data.name: Dark Magcargo

abilities.name: Hot Plate
abilities.text: As long as Dark Magcargo is your Active Pokémon, whenever a player puts a Baby Pokémon or Basic Pokémon onto his or her Bench from his or her hand, this power does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power stops working if Dark Magcargo is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ball of Flame
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire Energy card attached to Dark Magcargo when you use this attack. If you do and if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and this attack does 20 damage to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: The shell on its back comes off easily, exposing the flames running through its body.

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.text: Each player discard the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Magcargo in order to use this attack. If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Streaming Mantle
abilities.text: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and and then shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent does the same.

attacks.name: Crushing Lava
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire or Fighting basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a Fire Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If you discard a Fighting Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Smooth Over
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Magcargo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

data.name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Magma Mantle
attacks.text: You may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 50 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

data.name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Flame Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

data.name: Magcargo

ancientTrait.name: Ω Barrier
ancientTrait.text: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Indomitable Blaze
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon-EX, this attack does 60 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

data.name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Stomp Off
attacks.text: Discard the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that circulate throughout its body.

data.name: Magcargo

abilities.name: Smooth Over
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of it.

data.flavorText: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

data.name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

attacks.name: Burning Ball
attacks.text: If Magcargo has at least 2 Fire Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Magcargo

abilities.name: Magma Pool
abilities.text: If Magcargo is your Active Pokémon and moves to the Bench, remove 1 Fire Energy card attached to Magcargo, if any, and attach it to the new Active Pokémon. (You can't choose an Energy card that you used to pay the Retreat Cost.)

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Magcargo when you use this attack. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.

data.name: Dark Magcargo
rules: This Pokémon is both Fire Darkness type.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each basic Energy card attached to all of your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Dual Armor
abilities.text: As long as Magcargo has any Fighting Energy attached to it, Magcargo is both Fire and Fighting type.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Extra Flame
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

data.name: Magcargo-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Crushing Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If it's a basic Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.text: Discard any amount of basic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Burning Magma-GX
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.text: Each player discard the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Fire Stream
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Magcargo in order to use this attack. If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Magcargo

abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.text: Magcargo can't be Asleep or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lava Plume
attacks.text: You may discard the top card of your deck. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.

abilities.name: Streaming Mantle
abilities.text: When you play Magcargo from your hand to evolve your Active Pokémon, you may discard the top 3 cards of your deck and and then shuffle 3 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you do, your opponent does the same.

attacks.name: Crushing Lava
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire or Fighting basic Energy card attached to Magcargo. If you discard a Fire Energy card in this way, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned. If you discard a Fighting Energy card in this way, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.name: Magcargo ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Melting Mountain
attacks.text: Discard the top card from your deck. If that card is a basic Energy card, attach it to Magcargo ex.

attacks.name: Lava Flow
attacks.text: You may discard any number of basic Energy cards attached to Magcargo ex when you use this attack. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each basic Energy card you discarded.

rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: Discard any amount of basic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Burning Magma-GX
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.text: Put all Energy attached to this Pokémon in the Lost Zone.

abilities.text: Whenever your opponent's Active Pokémon moves to the Bench during their turn, their new Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Magcargo ex
rules: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
Tera: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

data.name: Ethan's Magcargo

abilities.name: Melt Away
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has no Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Lava Burst
attacks.text: Discard up to 5 Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: This Pokémon lives near the craters of volcanoes. It stores fire energy in its shell of cooled and hardened magma.
